channel.title: Comments on: What Are Friends For?

item.title: By: Zhaneel
item.dc:creator: Zhaneel
item.description: Sounds about right. My husband did that for the robes I needed for a warlock quest after camping the ultra rare spawns for the recipe drop. It was only 2g, but that was a lot when we were still under level 35.
item.content:encoded: Sounds about right. My husband did that for the robes I needed for a warlock quest after camping the ultra rare spawns for the recipe drop. It was only 2g, but that was a lot when we were still under level 35.
